CmdLine: apk add --no-cache --virtual .persistent-deps             libbz2             libpng             libjpeg-turbo             freetype             icu             libldap             libmemcached             tidyhtml             libxslt
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -xe       && apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-hexindai-deps $PHPIZE_DEPS                 freetype-dev                 libjpeg-turbo-dev                 libpng-dev                 bzip2-dev                 icu-dev                 openldap-dev                 libxml2-dev                 tidyhtml-dev                 libxslt-dev                 libmemcached-dev                 zlib-dev       && docker-php-ext-configure gd                 --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include/                 --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/                 --with-png-dir=/usr/include/       && docker-php-ext-install gd                 bcmath                 bz2                 calendar                 pdo_mysql                 dba                 exif                 intl                 ldap                 mysqli                 pcntl                 shmop                 soap                 sockets                 sysvmsg                 sysvsem                 sysvshm                 tidy                 wddx                 xmlrpc                 xsl                 zip       && pecl install memcached redis       && docker-php-ext-enable memcached redis       && apk del .build-hexindai-deps       && docker-php-source delete
Commands.Name: run
